article_title: The House Just Passed Another Bailout, This Time for Highways and Transit
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Irresponsibility was on display when the House voted down an amendment that would limit highway construction dollars from going to landscaping projects.
